message: it doesnt seem like you need to be a student according to nyc resistors nice list of local resources: http://wiki.nycresistor.com/wiki/Local_Resources_/_Parts
They always ask for ID. I've been turned down without it, but maybe it depends on the cashier. The components are meant for use by ITP students, which is why I suspect they care.
it worked out for me today, got a couple of voltage regulators, inverters and transistors, way cheaper than radioshack.
